extendedInfo.description: Removes open WiFi networks from the saved networks list after disconnecting.Features:    * Notification reminders on connection/disconnection    * Whitelist of open networks to keep    * Settings saved using Google Android backup serviceIf you find this application useful please consider leaving a rating or reviewOpen source under the GNU GPL, http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gplGet involved at https://github.com/duncanje/android-open-wifi-network-removerforget,wifi,network,open,unsecure,unsecured
